definitions.definition: A sum or source of money.
definitions.example: a fund for the maintenance of underprivileged students

definitions.definition: A money-management operation, such as a mutual fund.
definitions.example: Several major funds were declared insolvent recently.

definitions.definition: A large supply of something to be drawn upon.
definitions.example: He drew on his immense fund of knowledge.
He used his inheritance to fund his gambling addiction.

definitions.definition: To form a debt into a stock charged with interest.
